messages.title: Lara Chaplin your LOCAL LABOUR candidate
messages.content: I am proud to live in Tewkesbury. Working in education I am passionate about making a difference to people's lives. I am active in the local community and I 'shop local' to support our high streets. I believe politicians should be accessible and visible in the community to listen to the needs of people. I therefore promise to have regular and open surgeries in locations across the constituency.

messages.title: Lara's promises to you
content: A properly funded and public National Health Service for the many, not private profit making for the few
A national education system where every child, young adult and adult matters
A fairer, greener and better place to work
Support for businesses to focus on people, the planet and building a world class economy
Full trust in you the people to make the final decision on our membership of the EU.

A fairer, greener and better place to work

Full trust in you the people to make the final decision on our membership of the EU.
